description: React hook for real-time notifications using Supabase, managing subscriptions, local storage, and unread count updates.

methods.name: mapRowToNotification
methods.description: Converts a Supabase row into the app's local notification format, resilient to schema drift.

methods.name: upsertById
methods.description: Inserts or updates a notification in the list based on its id.

methods.name: isSupabaseConfigured
methods.description: Checks if the necessary environment variables for Supabase are set.

methods.name: useRealtimeNotifications
